panelText.text: Sandy stops by later that afternoon, and Emma spends time with her showing her the pictures and video she has saved on her laptop.
One of Emma’s colleagues tells her that if this continues he is going to talk to their manager about the interruptions and the fact that she is not pulling her fair share of the workload.

Emma’s manager later finds out about the interruptions and Emma conducting business for her outside job while at work. He schedules a meeting with her to discuss how her real estate work is interfering with her job responsibilities. Emma has some explaining to do and may face disciplinary consequences as a result of her actions.

instructionText.text: Select Next to reconsider your decision and try again.
